name: Gnome Man's Land (RawlinStone)
description:
Play as a gnome and try to find your way out with your little fairy friend.
A and D to move left and right respectively.
LMB to grapple. Hold LMB to rappel. RMB to cut the rappel line.
Spacebar to jump
Ctrl  to crouch
Escape to open options



Spencer Bremer - Audio
Jaren Gerdes - Programmer, UI, level design
Ivan Kim - Programmer, UI, Level design
Rawlin Stone - Programmer, Light, Level design
Andrew Yin - Artist
